abstract: Turkish police arrest at least 40 fellow officers on charges of wiretapping Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan and other top officials; arrested officers are suspected of having ties to Fethullah Gulen, exiled Muslim cleric and Erdogan rival who has been accused of plot to overthrow government.
lead_paragraph: The arrests are part of a feud between Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Fethullah Gulen, an influential cleric accused of plotting to overthrow the government.

headline.main: Police Officers in Turkey Held in Wiretaps of Officials
headline.print_headline: Police Officers in Turkey Held in Wiretaps of Officials

snippet: The arrests are part of a feud between Recep Tayyip Erdogan and Fethullah Gulen, an influential cleric accused of plotting to overthrow the government.

keywords.value: Wiretapping and Other Eavesdropping Devices and Methods
keywords.name: subject
